languages.text: "Ошибки провидцев привели Крударах к гибели, Шайрэнкхей! И их же чрезмерная жестокость и жажда отмщения чуть не погубила тех из нас, кто вопреки всему сумел выжить в пустоте чуждых звезд. Ты знаешь это так же, как и я, но продолжаешь исполнять их волю. О, Шайрэнкхей, вы могли бы уйти через Врата Паутины — подальше от опасностей и невзгод Простора. Но вместо этого остаетесь здесь. Погибаете. Враждуете с мон-кай. Вам было мало крови Детей Азуриана? Потери дома? Хотите подвергнуть опасности еще больше собратьев?"

traits.locale_text: "Ошибки провидцев привели Крударах к гибели, Шайринкай! И их же чрезмерная жестокость и жажда отмщения чуть не погубила тех из нас, кто вопреки всему сумел выжить в пустоте чуждых звезд. Ты знаешь это так же, как и я, но продолжаешь исполнять их волю. О, Шайринкай, ыы могли бы уйти через Врата Паутины — подальше от опасностей и невзгод Простора. Но вместо этого остаетесь здесь. Погибаете. Враждуете с мон-кай. Вам было мало крови Детей Азуриана? Потери дома? Хотите подвергнуть орасности еще больше собратьев?"

languages.text: "The Farseers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost doomed those of us who managed to survive against all odds in the void between foreign stars. You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying. You are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have not the Children of Asuryan spilt enough blood? Is it not enough that we have lost our home? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"
languages.original_text: "Ошибки провидцев привели Крударах к гибели, Шайрэнкхей! И их же чрезмерная жестокость и жажда отмщения чуть не погубила тех из нас, кто вопреки всему сумел выжить в пустоте чуждых звезд. Ты знаешь это так же, как и я, но продолжаешь исполнять их волю. О, Шайрэнкхей, вы могли бы уйти через Врата Паутины — подальше от опасностей и невзгод Простора. Но вместо этого остаетесь здесь. Погибаете. Враждуете с мон-кай. Вам было мало крови Детей Азуриана? Потери дома? Хотите подвергнуть опасности еще больше собратьев?"

traits.locale_text: "The seers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost ruined those of us who managed to survive against all odds inside the void between the alien stars. You know it just as well as I do, but keep doing their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying, you are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have the Children of Asuryan spilled not enough blood? Was losing our home not enough? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"

You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"

languages.text: «¡Los errores de los videntes condenaron Crudarach, Shairenkhei! Y su excesiva crueldad y sed de venganza estuvieron a punto de condenar a los pocos que sobrevivimos en el vacío que separa estas estrellas desconocidas. Lo sabes tan bien como yo, y pese a ello insistes en cumplir su voluntad. Ay, Shairenkhei, podrías cruzar el portal de la Telaraña y alejarte de los peligros y tribulaciones de la Extensión. Pero en vez de eso, has decidido quedarte. Estáis muriendo, estáis luchando contra los mon-keigh. ¿No han derramado ya suficiente sangre los hijos de Asuryan? ¿No te basta con haber perdido nuestro hogar? ¿Por qué tanto empeño en someter a tus congéneres a penurias mayores?».
languages.original_text: "The Farseers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost doomed those of us who managed to survive against all odds in the void between foreign stars. You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying. You are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have not the Children of Asuryan spilt enough blood? Is it not enough that we have lost our home? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Los errores de los videntes condenaron Crudarach, Shairenkhei! Y su excesiva crueldad y sed de venganza estuvieron a punto de destruir a los pocos que sobrevivimos en el vacío que separa estas estrellas alienígenas. Lo sabes tan bien como yo, y pese a ello insistes en cumplir su voluntad. Ay, Shairenkhei, podrías cruzar el portal de la Telaraña y alejarte de los peligros y tribulaciones de la Extensión. Pero en vez de eso, has decidido quedarte. Estáis muriendo, estáis luchando contra los mon-keigh. ¿No han derramado ya suficiente sangre los hijos de Asuryan? ¿No te basta con haber perdido nuestro hogar? ¿Por qué tanto empeño en someter a tu gente a penurias mayores?».

languages.text: “正是那些先知犯下的错误，才导致了克鲁达拉赫的毁灭，榭伦凯！我们这些人竭尽全力，想要在陌生的星空之中存活下来，可他们极端残忍的举动，还有对复仇的渴望，差点害死了所有的幸存者。你我对此心知肚明，可你仍然打算听命于他们。哦，榭伦凯，你明明可以逃进网道，远离扩区的危险与苦难，可你却非要选择留在这里，哪怕快没命了，也要继续与猴子争斗不休。难道阿苏焉之子流的血还不够多吗？难道我们失去了家园还不够吗？你为什么要让更多的族人面临致命的危险？”
languages.original_text: "The Farseers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost doomed those of us who managed to survive against all odds in the void between foreign stars. You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying. You are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have not the Children of Asuryan spilt enough blood? Is it not enough that we have lost our home? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"

traits.locale_text: “正是那些先知犯下的错误，才导致了克鲁达拉赫的毁灭，榭伦凯！我们这些人竭尽全力，想要在陌生的星空之中存活下来，可他们的极端残忍与对复仇的渴望，差点害死了所有的幸存者。你我对此心知肚明，可你仍然打算听命于他们。哦，榭伦凯，你明明可以逃进网道，远离扩区的危险与苦难，可你却非要选择留在这里，哪怕快没命了，也要继续与猴子争斗不休。难道阿苏焉之子流的血还不够多吗？难道我们失去了家园还不够吗？你为什么要让更多的族人面临致命的危险？”

languages.text: « Ce sont les erreurs des Grands Prophètes qui ont condamné Crudarach, Shairenkhei ! Et par leur cruauté excessive et leur soif de vengeance, ils ont bien failli coûter à ceux qui avaient réussi à survivre contre toute attente dans le néant entre les étoiles étrangères. Vous le savez aussi bien que moi et pourtant, vous persistez à leur obéir. Oh, Shairenkhei, vous pourriez emprunter le portail sur la Toile pour fuir les dangers des Étendues, mais au lieu de cela, vous avez choisi d'y rester. Vous vous mourez, vous combattez les mon-keigh... Les enfants d'Asuryan n'ont-ils pas versé suffisamment de sang ? La perte de notre monde ne vous a-t-elle pas suffi ? Pourquoi persister à exposer les vôtres à un péril mortel ? »
languages.original_text: "The Farseers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost doomed those of us who managed to survive against all odds in the void between foreign stars. You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying. You are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have not the Children of Asuryan spilt enough blood? Is it not enough that we have lost our home? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont les erreurs des prophètes qui ont condamné Crudarach, Shairenkhei ! Et par leur cruauté excessive et leur soif de vengeance, ils ont bien failli coûter à ceux qui avaient réussi à survivre contre toute attente dans le néant entre les étoiles étrangères. Vous le savez aussi bien que moi et pourtant, vous persistez à leur obéir. Pourquoi persister à exposer les vôtres à un péril mortel ? »

languages.text: 「予見者たちの過ちがクルダラを破滅させたのだ、シャイレンケイ！そして、彼らの行き過ぎた残酷さと復讐への渇望は、星々の間の虚空の中で、あらゆる困難を乗り越えて生き残った私たちを破滅させるところだったのだ。あなたも私と同じようにそれを知っているはずなのに、それでも彼らの言いなりになり続けているではないか。シャイレンケイ、網辻門を手中におさめられれば、我々はエクスパンスの危険や苦難から逃れられる。だがあなたは代わりにここに留まることを選んだ。あなたは死にかけ、モン＝ケイと反目している。アシュリアンの御子らは血を流し足りないのか？我らの故郷を失ってまだ足りないのか？なぜさらに多くの血族を死の危険にさらすことを望むのだ？」
languages.original_text: "The Farseers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost doomed those of us who managed to survive against all odds in the void between foreign stars. You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying. You are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have not the Children of Asuryan spilt enough blood? Is it not enough that we have lost our home? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"

traits.locale_text: 「予見者たちの過ちがクルダラを破滅させたのだ、シャイレンケイ！そして、彼らの行き過ぎた残酷さと復讐への渇望は、星々の間の虚空の中で、あらゆる困難を乗り越えて生き残った私たちを破滅させるところだったのだ。あなたも私と同じようにそれを知っているはずなのに、それでも彼らの言いなりになり続けているではないか。シャイレンケイ、網辻門を手中におさめられれば、我々はエクスパンスの危険や苦難から逃れられる。だがあなたは代わりにここに留まることを選んだ。あなたは死にかけ、モン＝ケイと反目している。アシュリアンの御子らは血を流し足りないのか？我らの故郷を失ってまだ足りないのか？なぜさらに多くの血族を死の危険にさらすことを望むのだ？」

languages.text: "Die Fehler der Runenpropheten haben Crudarach dem Untergang geweiht, Shairenkhei! Und ihre übermäßige Grausamkeit und ihr übermäßiger Rachedurst hätten beinahe jene von uns vernichtet, die in der Leere zwischen den fremden Sternen trotz aller Widrigkeiten überlebt haben. Ihr wisst es ebenso gut wie ich, und doch tut Ihr weiter, was sie Euch befehlen. Ach, Shairenkhei, Ihr könntet das Netzportal nehmen und die Gefahren und Mühen der Ausdehnung hinter Euch lassen. Doch stattdessen habt Ihr entschieden, hierzubleiben. Ihr sterbt, Ihr führt eine Fehde mit den Chem-Pan-Sey. Haben die Kinder von Asuryan noch nicht genug Blut vergossen? Hat es nicht gereicht, unsere Heimat zu verlieren? Warum wollt Ihr noch mehr Eurer Brüder und Schwestern tödlicher Gefahr aussetzen?"
languages.original_text: "The Farseers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost doomed those of us who managed to survive against all odds in the void between foreign stars. You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying. You are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have not the Children of Asuryan spilt enough blood? Is it not enough that we have lost our home? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Fehler der Seher haben Crudarach dem Untergang geweiht, Shairenkhei! Und ihre übermäßige Grausamkeit und ihr übermäßiger Rachedurst hätten beinahe jene von uns vernichtet, die in der Leere zwischen den fremden Sternen trotz aller Widrigkeiten überlebt haben. Ihr wisst es ebenso gut wie ich, und doch tut Ihr weiter, was sie Euch befehlen. Ach, Shairenkhei, Ihr könntet das Netzportal nehmen und die Gefahren und Mühen der Ausdehnung hinter Euch lassen. Doch stattdessen habt Ihr entschieden, hierzubleiben. Ihr sterbt, Ihr führt eine Fehde mit den Chem-Pan-Sey. Haben die Kinder von Asuryan noch nicht genug Blut vergossen? Hat es nicht gereicht, unsere Heimat zu verlieren? Warum wollt Ihr noch mehr Eurer Brüder und Schwestern tödlicher Gefahr aussetzen?"

languages.text: "Ötesezenlerin hataları, Crudarach'ı ölüme mahkûm etti Shairenkhei! Lüzumsuz gaddarlıkları ve intikama karşı açlıklarıysa yabancı yıldızlar arasında uzanan uçsuzda, tüm zorluklara rağmen hayatta kalmayı başaranları neredeyse canından ediyordu. Bunu sen de benim kadar iyi biliyorsun ama emirlerini yerine getirmeye devam ediyorsun. Ah Shairenkhei, Ağyol Geçidi'ni kullanabilir ve Enginlik'in tüm tehlikeleriyle kederlerinden uzaklaşabilirsin. Ancak bunun yerine burada kalmayı seçtin. Ölüyorsun. Mon-keighlerle çatışma hâlindesin. Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın yeterince kanı dökülmedi mi? Yuvamızı kaybetmemiz yetmedi mi? Neden soydaşlarını daha da ölümcül tehlikelere maruz bırakmak istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "The Farseers' mistakes doomed Crudarach, Shairenkhei! And their excessive cruelty and thirst for vengeance almost doomed those of us who managed to survive against all odds in the void between foreign stars. You know it just as well as I do, but you continue to do their bidding. Oh, Shairenkhei, you could take the Webway Gate — and go away from the dangers and tribulations of the Expanse. But you have chosen to stay here instead. You are dying. You are feuding with the mon-keigh. Have not the Children of Asuryan spilt enough blood? Is it not enough that we have lost our home? Why do you wish to expose even more of your kin to mortal peril?"
